block.p: HOFFMAN-Morton. Age 81 in Baltimore, MD. July 3, 2000. Respectd economic analyst, teacher and author in the field of urban planning. Graduate of CCNY and NYU. Served in Britain in U.S. Army during WWII Rank of Captain. Son of Nathan Hoffman and Sadye Ugast Hoffman of NYC. Survived by wife Janet Leland Hoffman of Baltimore; daughter Ellen Hoffman of Berkeley, CA, daughter Constance Baker of Baltimore; four grandchildren; sister Rhoda Hoffman and brother Fred Hoffman of New York plus dear cousins and good friends.
